pkgmetadata.longdescription: Evidential Analysis of Genetic Association Data // Evidential regression analysis for dichotomous and quantitative outcome data. The following references described the methods in this package: Strug, L. J., Hodge, S. E., Chiang, T., Pal, D. K., Corey, P. N., Rohde, C. (2010) doi:10.1038/ejhg.2010.47. Strug, L. J., Hodge, S. E. (2006) doi:10.1159/000094709. Royall, R. (1997) ISBN:0-412-04411-0.
